name: guard-swap
effect: User swaps its Defense and Special Defense modifiers with the target.
short_effect: User swaps Defense and Special Defense changes with the target.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.
flavor_text.platinum: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.
